H0.text: when did radio shack change to the source. 2002

H1.text: when did radio shack change to the source. 2008

H2.text: when did radio shack change to the source. 2010

H3.text: when did radio shack change to the source. 2005

A4.text: On March 24, 2005, a US district court judge ruled in favour of RadioShack, requiring InterTAN stop using the brand name in products, packaging or advertising by June 30, 2005. The Canadian stores were rebranded under the name 'The Source by Circuit City'.
